name: Totally Safe Airways
description:
What Is It

Features

  • Several different environments, each with their own personality.
  • Many different levels for each environment
  • Varying different planes each with different sizes, speeds and perhaps bizarre traits

In Development

This game is currently in development and as such bugs are a strong possibility.  Levels and features are currently being worked on. Currently only one environment is available although plans to release at least two more are in the works. Essentially we need only to design the levels for these environment. The artwork is currently in place. 

Different game modes will be implemented at some point in the future also. Currently the classic point, click, drag and land is the only available type of game mode. 

Contact

Like us on facebook at Totally Safe Airways
